name: Higher Society
description: Seven's quest to become more human, to better understand social mores, takes her back to ancient England. But when her period romance intersects with the starship she resides on, it becomes a sci-fi epic begging for just the right hero!
rules:
-- In a Skirmish Event, you will engage in space battles against thematically appropriate foes until the Event's conclusion.
-- There are two Phases to this Event! Each Phase is individually timed.
-- Unique Ship Battle Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using any version of Seven, Burleigh, Torres, Costumed, Romantic, or crew with matching Battle Traits, will provide a bonus.
-- Using the Captain Proton Rocket Ship, the U.S.S. Raging Queen, or the Borg Sphere will provide a bonus to hull.
-- Every Ship Battle you win earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock Threshold Rewards!
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Seven, Burleigh, Torres, Costumed, Romantic

featured_crew.name: Paris
featured_crew.flavor: Paris created a detailed 19th-century Irish village in the holodeck so the entire crew could finally get some rest.

action.name: Fair Haven Is Perfect Just The Way It Is

featured_crew.name: Burleigh
featured_crew.flavor: This brooding, enigmatic widower stars in Janeway’s holoprogram. Unraveling his secrets may be the only way to open his walled off heart.

action.name: I Can't Help Myself. I've Fallen In Love With You.

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Seven
rewards.flavor: After being severed from the Borg Collective, Seven of Nine--now called Seven--struggled to adapt.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

ship.name: Borg Sphere
ship.flavor: Borg spheres were primarily scout and long-range tactical vessels. Borg cubes sometimes housed Borg spheres as auxillary craft.

ship.name: Captain Proton Rocket Ship
ship.flavor: The heroic Captain Proton uses this heavily-armed rocket ship to defend Earth against dastardly villains!

ship.name: U.S.S. Raging Queen
ship.flavor: A Curry-type medium battlecruiser operated by Starfleet in the 24th century that fought in the early part of the Dominion War.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Voyage Revival
rewards.flavor: Use to instantly revive a failed Voyage.

rewards.name: 10x Portal
rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!

rewards.name: Paris
rewards.flavor: Paris created a detailed 19th-century Irish village in the holodeck so the entire crew could finally get some rest.

action.name: Fair Haven Is Perfect Just The Way It Is

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Paris
rewards.flavor: Paris created a detailed 19th-century Irish village in the holodeck so the entire crew could finally get some rest.

content.reroll_info:
Skirmish rewards are additive. By continuously rolling you receive additional rewards. No rewards are lost by rolling again.
DROP RATES:
Event VP: 13.58%
Time Portal Pack: 0.13%
Chronitons: 11.45%
Honor: 14.11%
Intel: 27.43%
Credits: 33.29%

Chronitons: 11.45%
Honor: 14.11%
Intel: 27.43%
Credits: 33.29%

screens.text: "In order to take command of these naval forces braving this...star-filled ocean, I shall need a woman at my side of proper sensibilities. Have you not enough fabric to clothe yourself?"
"I am told this is the style for a formal occasion. Perhaps it is your sensibilities that are improper, sir, or was it so appropriate in your time to concern yourself with what others wore?"
"Well, it is certainly unique, I will grant you that. Now, what of these strange vessels? How exactly do we set a course?"

"Captain, are you hearing this? Seven's been spending hours on the holodeck and now, her sci-fi historical romance is broadcasting fleetwide. Something in those communications seems to be impacting every ship's system. We could use your help to wrangle these stray ships!"
"In order to take command of these naval forces braving this...star-filled ocean, I shall need a woman at my side of proper sensibilities. Have you not enough fabric to clothe yourself?"
"I am told this is the style for a formal occasion. Perhaps it is your sensibilities that are improper, sir, or was it so appropriate in your time to concern yourself with what others wore?"
"Well, it is certainly unique, I will grant you that. Now, what of these strange vessels? How exactly do we set a course?"

"Captain, are you hearing this? Seven's been spending hours on the holodeck and now, her sci-fi historical romance is broadcasting fleetwide. Something in those communications seems to be impacting every ship's system. We could use your help to wrangle these stray ships!"
"What is this strange cubed monstrosity? Why is it firing on us?"

responses.text: "How does that explain what's happening to the rest of the fleet?"
"Not now. I need to see if Lord Burleigh beats the Borg and wins Seven's heart!"

screens.text: "This must be what's causing the glitch in Seven's cortical array! That has to have some relation to how her experiences on the holodeck have expanded fleetwide!"

"That's what the doc says. Seems like this has happened before. It's apparently a fail safe to keep Seven from regaining her humanity. Only it's never caused damage to anyone but Seven before. This time is different."

"Not completely sure, but the Borg cube makes me suspect they're involved in amplifying the signal. The issues started on Voyager. We were hearing Seven over our combadges. Next thing we knew, this drama was playing out on the bridge and we couldn't take control of the ship."
"Captain, I enjoy a good holo romance just as much as anyone, but there is a time and a place for everything, you know?"
"At any rate, we need you to get back out there and disrupt the comms systems of those ships. Knock out enough and it should disrupt the signal."
